wikipedia_page.main: Aqib Khan (Urdu: عاقب  خان; born 24 August 1994) is an English actor of Pakistani descent.

response: *Aqib Khan as Rashid Jarwar, Juror # 7 - A boy who has just turned 18 and has Asperger syndrome
* Aqib Khan – actor who played Sajid Khan in the movie West is West
|West Is West|| Andy DeEmmony || Aqib Khan, Om Puri, Linda Bassett, Robert Pugh || Comedy drama || February 2011||

West Is West is a 2010 British comedy-drama film directed by Andy DeEmmony and starring Om Puri, Linda Bassett, Aqib Khan, Ila Arun and Jimi Mistry. A sequel to the 1999 comedy film East Is East, it was written by Ayub Khan-Din and produced by Leslee Udwin for Assassin Films and BBC Films.
